amendment.description: To authorize the use of certain funds previously appropriated to the Small Business Administration for loan guarantee subsidies under section 7(a) of the Small Business Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 129 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 129 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S1433-1438) To authorize the use of certain funds previously appropriated to the Small Business Administration for loan guarantee subsidies under section 7(a) of the Small Business Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 129 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 129 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kerry.
